Introduction

Kwon Taeeun is a South Korean singer and model under A.CONIC. He is a member of the upcoming boy group WOW and pre-debut project band A.FACT.

In 2019, Taeeun participated in Mnet's reality show Produce X 101. Unfortunately, in the eighth episode, he was eliminated and ranked 34th place.

On October 23, he was introduced as a member of the pre-debut project band A.FACT.

On September 22, 2020, he was revealed to be a part of A.CONIC's upcoming seven-member boy group WOW.
